content.label: Many hours of fun. Great concept beautifully executed.

Crashes everytime on 2nd to last Volcano level!!!

Also overly nihilistic narrator is annoying.

I have an iPod Touch 4G with iOS 6.1.6 and the game keeps crashing.  At first, it was doing it after I tapped play.  Now, it happens every time I try to start the first level (the one with snow).  Please fix.

I love graphics and new games but this simple games is the one of the best games I have ever played through my life.
Such a wonderful art,beautiful puzzles and amazing music with a lovely story...what more could I ask for.
I'm one of your fan guys....Keep the good work up..:)
It is a wonderful thing when an iPhone game gives me feelings. This game is a rarity. Crashes occasionally, though.

title.label: This is how a game should be

content.label: Cannot believe this game is free. I would easily pay for it. Great levels, stages and length but wish it could go on forever.
Just beat the main game what a great experience.  Now on to void mode.  Great work beautifully done.

The gameplay in this is really cool. It is somewhat reminiscent of the floor paints in Portal 2 (run fast, bounce, etc). I really liked playing it. 

HOWEVER - it was really short. I felt like I had just gone through a long tutorial, just gathered all my abilities, and now I was ready and excited to figure out some real puzzles. But then the game ended. I hope there is more coming because this was really fun to play.
Yes
Interesting concept, starts off cool and creepy. Hit the jump "button" off a millimeter and miss a stupid-easy jump 4 times in a row, each time listening to the narration again and I am deleting it.
It closes midgame all the time! Especially on volcano levels.  It's fun but the bugs are infuriating.

Great game 
Must have
It keeps shutting off after about a minute playing.

I really enjoyed this thoughtful and fun platformer. It's an original and interesting game that will give you a good 3-4 hours of untimed, nothing-more-to-buy gaming bliss. So refreshing in this new world of micropayments and coin-based games. Awesome job devs!

I just wrote a big, beautiful review, but it got deleted. 
With all the attention to detail and challenging, yet forgiving levels, you can tell that some very creative, artistic person must have poured quite a lot of time and love into this game. 
The storyline adds purpose into the game as well as builds up your emotional attachment to the character, Born. I loved this game so much and I recommend it to anyone!

I came into this game with low expectations seeing as that it was a phone game and had my mind blown. For the price of this game it offers quite a lot of fun, thoughtful, and interactive gameplay. This is a game with a great story, great gameplay, and wonderful voiceacting. *10/10*
Idk why the app store keeps the best games hidden away. This game is beautiful,and deserves to be more in the spotlight.

title.label: A Fantastic and Beautiful Art Work

content.label: I usually do not write reviews for games because I usually do not get impressed by them.  However, this is a puzzle game like no other I have ever found in the iTunes AppStore.  I just started playing it yesterday but I have to say I am already in love with this app. I think it is one of the most beautiful, artistic and entertaining games with an engaging and intriguing story line that I have ever seen especially since it is a dark one.  Everything about this app indicates high quality design from the surreal and artistically designed environments and beautiful cinematic music to the voice of the narrator, the dark story line and innovative game play. I wish I could give it more stars. I will be looking to more apps from Beautifun Games. Thanks for creating such beautiful game.

title.label: The most unintentionally hilarious game in the App Store

content.label:
Hahaha! Oh, the serious voiceovers. The deep "meaning". The tired gameplay mechanics. This game wants to think of itself as a statement. In reality, it's on par with some of those classic bad movies that are so bad they're good. It's just asking for an episode of MST2K.

I chuckled thru the terrible narration for the first few areas until I encountered the...dun dun DUN...Crawlaggar! Then I just howled.

If you want to play an absolutely stunning platform game on iOS with truly original gameplay mechanics and actual personality, try Leo's Fortune. But yawn at Nihilumbra.
This game is truly beautiful. I hope it never ends.
Wwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwooooooooooooooowwwwwwwwwwwww!!!!!!!
Such a good game but keeps crashing in volcano stage
An amazing game with a wonderful story. Definetly worth getting. Wish I could give it more than five stars.
Gameplay is cool but God the narrator is obnoxious. The story is subpar. Play it on mute...

title.label: iPhone 4s Crashes on the stage of volcano

content.label: Awesome game but crashes on stage 4-6. And some stages crashed before! I would rate 5 stars if fixed. Btw, my device is iPhone 4s,iOS 7.1.2

This is 1 of the most beautiful dark atmospheric games EVER. This & Slender Rising r favourites. 1 issue; the manual controls. Worked fine on level 1. Level 2, the forest, when he falls & gets 2 the bouncy green, I can jump, but it's very tricky. He gets stuck bouncing & I can't move him ahead! I agree with the reviewers mentioning the manual controls r kinda buggy. This was slightly improved in the upd8 but not much. Too bad. I wish I had the Nintendo or Sega, whatever it was on b4 the iPhone so I could play it thru. I play on an iPad 2 with iOS 8 installed. Absolutely beautiful game though. I just hope someday I can play the whole thing!
Great gameplay and game physics! Love it! But I don't like being constantly told I am nothing. One star.

This app should be featured on the homepage! It's beautifully rendered and plays smooth with perfect pacing (It introduces you to puzzle gameplay elements in a steady and experiential way. No reading text tutorials!) and many many hours of good old platforming, pretty environments, a full-blown story with a logical twist, and interesting gameplay controls (whilst moving the character by tilting the device or sliding with your finger you also can slide your finger across the ground to "draw" paths with different colors activating helpful [or not, your choice] effects) + cinematic music and narration! This app is a sure fire keeper! Amazing job developer! After watching the trailer and visiting the developer's website I was thoroughly intrigued and had to experience it myself! This isn't like any of the other prolific puzzlers populating the app store! 5 solid gold stars!

This game is pretty awesome. Love the graphics, the progression of the stages, I'm confident most people will lose quite a bit of time enjoying this gem. If there is a con it would be the incessant narrative of the story, it feels like a constant tutorial through the whole game sometimes, it'd be nice to just play and figure it out for myself at times. But the way everything evolves is incredibly fun and entertaining. I highly recommend buying this game!
New levels, any time soon?

This is the beat game I have ever played! Notch cant beat this. Anyway I would rate this 10000000000 stars if I could! The gameplay is awesome, the sound affects are shocking, and the story is so interesting!!!! This should have a sequel!!! Almost has interesting has the five nights at freddys backstory

Listen this is the best game ive seen in a long time on the app store but with the last update i cant play the game at all its always crashing which really upsets me because well i cant play the game anymore please fix this i have an iPod 4th gen maybe thats why the update wont let me play the game but i dont know anyway please fix this

I found it very original and it has many underlying messages.
Amazing job devs
Great game but crashes on stage VI of the Volcano - I would rate 5 stars if fixed.
Latest update breaks game on iPhone 3GS.

title.label: One of the best games on the App Store

content.label: Excellent game. Innovative controls. Fun and challenging gameplay. Really just brilliant. One of the best values I've seen on the App Store, hands down! Great job and thanks for the update!
Glad to see this hidden gem run on IOS 8! A must have game. Great job developers! Thank you.

I use the manual controls rather than tilting but there seems to be a bug with the manual controls. Can this be fixed?

But I love this new update. I've been waiting a while for it on other than the controls it's great.

When is this game going to support iOS 8 I really want to play it but I have iOS 8 and can't üòë
I like this game on my iPhone but it won't open on my iPad. I see it's been over 2 years since it's been updated.

I really want to give this app 5 stars but I can't play it! Every time I try to open it it crashes. I have a brand new iPhone 6 with iOS 8 and the app crashes every time I try to open it. Please fix I really want to play!!
Just upgraded iPhone and it seems to crash on iOS8.
The graphics were really good

And I bought it to enjoy on this new large screen :( 
edit: 3 months later and it still crashes when opened.

I got a 64gb Iphone 5S. Works great. Play Heroes of Order and Chaos with it. No problems. No lag. Gave hard-earned cash for this app. DL'd it. It tries to open, and then crashes out. THE GAME WON'T EVEN OPEN!  I got 30 gig space left. What a joke...  Where's the zero stars when you need it...

I have an iPhone 6 and I can't even open this app without it crashing on the loading screen one second after opening it. I don't know whether this is because of iOS 8 but I have deleted the game and renown loaded it three times with no success

It's a while since I've played this game and I still vividly remember the beautiful chase that it was. I only have praise for it. There may be some people who would consider it boring because the game isn't all tap tap kill and the music is something orchestral and private, but for those who do enjoy a beautiful dark world with their games, those people will enjoy. Or even people who can appreciate a challenge or a puzzle, there haven't been many games I've played that resemble this one. They may exist but I haven't found them. Send other games like this my way.

I wish I could write a review but this game crashes at startup! If you fix this bug and I am actually able to find out anything about this game, I will happily review my rating accordingly. Please fix.
I can't play because there's a bug or glitch or something where when I open the game it just closes by itself. Please fix because I really want to play. Thank you
